what if ...?.translation[0].definitions[: used to ask what you should do or what the result will be if something happens, especially something unpleasant
What if this plan of yours fails, what then?
‘What if it rains tomorrow?’ ‘We’ll just have to postpone it.’
What if we moved the sofa over here? Would that look better?
what if ...?.translation[1].definitions[: something that could happen in the future or could have happened in the past
If I thought about all of the what-ifs in my life, I would go crazy.
what if ...?.translation[2].definitions[: a way of examining a situation by deciding what you would do if something happened to change it
A risk management consultant can kick-start the process by providing a few, objective what-if? questions.
